basic_info.name: Jayasoorya Jithendra
basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Jayasoorya Jithendra, a Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience, currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at SUNY Buffalo. I specialize in Frontend and Full Stack Development and also have solid academic and project experience in Data Science and Machine Learning. I've contributed to impactful products at Dassault SystÃ¨mes, Siemens, and Synoriq, and I build scalable, user-friendly applications using technologies like React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I'm actively seeking Software Development or Data Science Internship opportunities across the U.S. to apply and grow my skills in real-world, innovative projects.
basic_info.philosophy: Iâ€™m a passionate, fast-learning technologist with a strong foundation in both frontend engineering and data-driven development. I thrive in agile, collaborative environments and enjoy solving problems through clean, maintainable code. With a track record of technical leadership, mentoring, and impactful contributions across web development and ML projects, I bring a balanced mix of product thinking and engineering depth. I believe in continuous learning, thoughtful design, and delivering value through scalable solutions.
basic_info.preference: I'm currently looking for Software Development, Frontend, Full Stack, or Data Science / Machine Learning Internship roles in the U.S. I am not considering relocation back to India and am open to remote or in-person roles anywhere in the U.S. Iâ€™m especially excited about working with modern tech stacks involving React, Node.js, Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and cloud platforms like AWS or Azure, and contributing to data-driven products and scalable platforms.

projects.title: MotoAssist
projects.description: React based dashboard and axios services where users can create new bookings for bike services and repair and manage them

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: A social media application built on React and NodeJs where users can create posts with pcitures, add tags, like posts etc.

projects.title: Restaurant Booking App
projects.description: A hotel reservation application built on React and NodeJs where users can reserve tables and make bookings

projects.title: Sticky Notes
projects.description: A sticky note application built on React and NodeJs where users can create, edit and maintain their notes

icons.title: Frontend Development
icons.description: Skilled in building responsive and performant user interfaces using ReactJS, Vue.js, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Experienced in optimizing frontend components, enhancing user experience, and performing UI migrations from legacy stacks to modern architectures.

icons.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
icons.description: Hands-on experience in building predictive models using Python, Scikit-learn, CatBoost, and TensorFlow. Skilled in data preprocessing, feature engineering, model evaluation, and deploying ML models using Streamlit for real-time inference.

icons.title: Database Management
icons.description: Experienced in designing and integrating relational databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL, as well as NoSQL solutions like MongoDB. Proficient in writing optimized queries, performing schema design, and integrating databases into full-stack applications.

icons.title: E-Commerce & UI Optimization
icons.description: Developed and maintained e-commerce features such as booking systems, user dashboards, and authentication modules. Integrated accessibility best practices and responsive design to ensure seamless experience across devices and platforms.

experience.title: Software Engineering Specialist
experience.description: Worked on UI modernization and performance optimization of enterprise dashboard components within the 3DEXPERIENCE platform. Responsibilities included:
responsibilities: Enhanced and maintained UI widgets to improve usability and interface consistency
Led the migration of widgets from Vue 2 to Vue 3, improving maintainability and alignment with modern standards
Optimized dashboard components, achieving a 15% improvement in analytics speed for end-users
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of frontend features

experience.title: Software Engineer 2
experience.description: Served as a Software Engineer 2 at Synoriq, contributing to the development and maintenance of enterprise e-learning and loan management platforms. Responsibilities included:
responsibilities: Led and mentored a team of junior engineers through code reviews and technical guidance
Designed and implemented timezone management and user profile modules for the Launchpad e-learning platform using ReactJS
Applied accessibility best practices to enhance usability and inclusivity
Delivered new features and resolved high-priority bugs within the Loan Management System (LMS)
Ensured platform stability and performance through continuous integration and testing

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Worked as a Software Developer in Bangalore on MindSphere and WinCC Unified Edge technologies within a dynamic and agile team environment. Responsibilities included:
responsibilities: Provided system support across all environments including production
Contributed to the technical implementation of applications and infrastructure components
Supported the creation of standardized documentation and performed code reviews
Developed, tested, and maintained core system components
Utilized automated testing tools to ensure code reliability

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a machine learning-based movie recommendation engine as part of a full-time summer internship. The system leveraged user viewing history for intelligent suggestions.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Worked on improving the responsiveness and cross-device compatibility of an e-commerce website during an evening and holiday internship alongside undergraduate coursework.
